pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa pariveṇavāsikā bhikkhuniyo yāguyā kilamanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:6.3: Atha kho so pūgo bhikkhunīnaṃ yāguatthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa āpaṇikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:6.4: “amukassa, ayye, āpaṇikassa ghare yāguatthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:6.5: Tato taṇḍule āharāpetvā yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:6.6: Bhikkhuniyo tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:7.1: So pūgo jānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:7.2: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:13.2: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:13.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:13.6: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:14.1: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:14.2: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:14.3: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:16.2: sesakaṃ upaneti, sāmike apaloketvā upaneti, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
